result.reason: extApps.xml is intended to hold external app templates and use runtime replacement tokens (for example, `%PASSWORD%`) instead of storing sensitive values directly, so file-level encryption is not required.
result.approach: Close as by-design and document that credentials should be passed via replacement parameters rather than hardcoded in extApps definitions.
